tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Fixed Partial Denture (FPD),Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Crowns,Scaling / Polishing,
review: We are very much satisfied with dental procedures of Dr Trupti. She is very professional and expert in various dental procedures. She charges reasonable amount for all procedures; good value for the money. My family members had the following dental procedures successfully at Magic Dental of Dr Trupti : Root canal treatment, Ceramic crown and bridge, partial dentures for upper jaw, fixing loose dental crown and Scaling & polishing. Recommend  Dr Trupti for all Dental procedures, especially nearby residents of MH Vihanga, MH Krishe and TNGO colony.

Dear Madam Dr. Trupti,
I can’t say enough about you, *** *** ** ******** compassionate *** *** *** ** *** ********* ************ ******* ** ********* *** ************** Wow   Dr. Trupti
you are amazing.
It takes a special person to be aware that you need to treat the comfort level of a patient before you can successfully diagnose a condition and prescribe a treatment plan. You are one of those very few special doctors. The kindness and caring you showed my person is not only appreciated but will never be forgotten.
* Dental Magic you are so good. Carepassion, you get it!
From, 
Ramesh P
C/o Ms Madhavi Krishna Pyla (Patient)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Texted her late at night saying I have pain. She accepted to see me next day at 9:30! This is what I love about my India. 
She was super efficient, knowledgeable and did not force me to go in for any expensive treatment. Just gave suggestions and went with my choice.
Will definitely be my choice of dentist for my family hereafter.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Dr. Trupti communicates with the patient during every step of a procedure, making sure they are okay and not in too much pain. She makes patients comfortable and relaxed without pain. I want to thank her efforts during my root canaI. I am so grateful for your help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: Dr Trupti is one of the most honest doctors. I trust her for her advice. She ensures she gives the treatment which is required and optimum - neither more or less. She was patient with me to determine the root cause of the issue and gave me the treatment while minimising the risk. Thank you very much and very pleased and relieved with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Trupti is very good at her art. We visited her for my mom's root canal treatment. She spent a good amount of time understanding our case and making my mom feel comfortable.
The process was done in a single sitting. That's quite remarkable. The pricing was also reasonable and there is little or no wait time.
Overall - we would highly recommend Dr. Trupti

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Maxillo Facial Treatment,Dental Fillings,Dental X-Ray,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
The Doc is extremely resilient and realistic in her diagnosis. She discusses the patient dental issues at their face value without any filters. 

She even bothers to check on her patients after the procedure/treatment. This is something extremely rare these days.  Additionally, they are taking all COVID related precautions to provide a safe clinical experience. 

I have recommended her to my colleagues as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
It is first time when I took Dr. Trupti consultation. It was scary for me to think about tooth extraction, but was recommended for me to get aligners. She understood the entire cause very cautiously and told that she will not extract my tooth if there is pain. The best part is, her experience was reflecting when she was extracting the tooth.I didn’t feel any pain and removal was done swiftly. She was concerned about my health afterwards. Her prescription was good. I strongly recommend Dr. Trupti for dental treatment.

Thanks

The appointment she schedules are also very nicely handled without any conflicts with one another and in covid situation , its the best.
She did my dental fillings too.. and i am really happy this time with the work done..always thanks doctor ☺
